        recursive subroutine merge_sort_desc(arr, n)
        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(n)
        integer, intent(in) :: n
        integer :: mid
        integer, allocatable :: left(:), right(:) if (n <= 1) return
        mid = n/2
        allocate(left(mid))
        allocate(right(n-mid))
        left = arr(1:mid)
        right = arr(mid+1:n)
        call merge_sort_desc(left, mid)
        call merge_sort_desc(right, n-mid)
        call merge_desc(arr, left, right, mid, n-mid)
        deallocate(left, right)
        end subroutine

        subroutine merge_sort_desc(arr, n)
        integer, intent(in) :: n
        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(n)
        integer, allocatable :: work(:)
        integer :: width, i
        allocate(work(n))
        width = 1
        do while (width < n)
            do i=0, n-1, 2*width
                call merge_desc(arr, work, i+1, min(i+width, n), min(i+2*width, n)) end do
            arr = work   ! copy work back to arr? or swap?
            width = width * 2
        end do
        deallocate(work)

        recursive subroutine merge_sort_desc(arr, n)
        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(n)
        integer, intent(in) :: n
        integer :: mid
        integer, allocatable :: left(:), right(:)
        if (n <= 1) return
        mid = n/2
        allocate(left(mid))
        allocate(right(n-mid))
        left = arr(1:mid)
        right = arr(mid+1:n)
        call merge_sort_desc(left, mid)
        call merge_sort_desc(right, n-mid)
        call merge_desc(arr, left, right, mid, n-mid)
        deallocate(left, right)
        end subroutine

        subroutine merge_desc(arr, left, right, n1, n2)
        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: left(n1), right(n2)
        integer, intent(in) :: n1, n2
        integer :: i, j, k
        i=1; j=1; k=1
        do while (i<=n1 .and. j<=n2)
            if (left(i) >= right(j)) then   ! for descending: we want larger first
                arr(k) = left(i)
                i = i+1
            else
                arr(k) = right(j)
                j = j+1
            end if
            k = k+1
        end do
        do while (i<=n1)
            arr(k) = left(i)
            i = i+1
            k = k+1
        end do
        do while (j<=n2)
            arr(k) = right(j)
            j = j+1
            k = k+1
        end do
        end subroutine

        recursive subroutine merge_sort_desc(arr, n)
        integer, intent(in) :: n
        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(n)
        integer :: mid, i
        integer, allocatable :: left(:), right(:)
        if (n <= 1) return
        mid = n/2
        allocate(left(mid))
        allocate(right(n-mid))
        left = arr(1:mid)
        right = arr(mid+1:n)
        call merge_sort_desc(left, mid)
        call merge_sort_desc(right, n-mid)
        call merge_desc(arr, left, right, mid, n-mid)
        deallocate(left, right)
        end subroutine merge_sort_desc

        subroutine merge_desc(arr, left, right, n1, n2)
        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: left(n1), right(n2)
        integer, intent(in) :: n1, n2
        integer :: i, j, k
        i = 1; j = 1; k = 1
        do while (i <= n1 .and. j <= n2)
            if (left(i) >= right(j)) then
                arr(k) = left(i)
                i = i+1
            else
                arr(k) = right(j)
                j = j+1
            end if
            k = k+1
        end do
        do while (i <= n1)
            arr(k) = left(i)
            i = i+1
            k = k+1
        end do
        do while (j <= n2)
            arr(k) = right(j)
            j = j+1
            k = k+1
        end do
        end subroutine merge_desc
